result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ
result.translation: Those who do not expect to meet Us, and are pleased and content with the life of this world[12], and those who are heedless of Our signs,
result.footnotes: [12] They do not give a second’s thought to resurrection and reckoning; their current life is all that matters to them.
